summary: 移除一致性复制组中的复制对。移除复制对只是解除了复制对和一致性复制组的绑定关系，不会删除复制对。

schema.description: 一致性复制组所属的地域ID。

一致性复制组ID。

您可以调用[DescribeDiskReplicaGroups](~~426614~~)查询一致性复制组ID。
保证请求幂等性。从您的客户端生成一个参数值，确保不同请求间该参数值唯一。ClientToken只支持ASCII字符，且不能超过64个字符。更多信息，请参见[如何保证幂等性](~~25693~~)。

403.errorMessage: The pair cannot be removed in group current status.
The operation is not allowed in current status.
The operation is not allowed because no pair in the group.
The operation is not allowed due to pair and group having different RegionId or ZoneId.
The operation is not allowed due to pair and group status are not consistent.
The operation is not allowed because pair is already in another group.
The operation is not allowed because pair is not in any group.
The pair cannot be removed in pair  current status.
User is not authorized to operate.
User is not authorized to operate this action.

title: 移除一致性复制组中的复制对
description:
## 接口说明

- 一致性复制组功能支持的地域请参见[云盘异步复制概述](~~314563~~)。

- 一致性复制组必须处于**已创建**（`created`）、**已停止**（`stopped`）或者**失效**（`invalid`）状态。
